requestBody.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state API Trace

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

requestBody.failureMessage: owner-validate-compliance-controls: Compliance/credential verification API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: owner-validate-compliance-controls: Compliance/credential verification API is not exposed yet.

evidence.error: owner-validate-compliance-controls: Compliance/credential verification API is not exposed yet.

data.instruction: Run compliance workflow checks (credential sharing/access control/privacy constraints) for this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Access is scoped correctly and compliance workflow state is traceable in operational records.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.
